entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 5:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
